game_engine module¶

game_engine.attack(coordinates: tuple, board_to_attack: list, battleships: dict) → bool¶

Proccesses an attack on a battleship.

param coordinates: the (x, y) coordinates of the attack. param board_to_attack: the game board to attack. param battleships: dictionary representing battleships and their remaining lengths.

return bool: a boolean indicating if the attack was successful or not. return board_to_attack: the updated game board return battleships: the updated battleships dictionary.

game_engine.cli_coordinates_input() → tuple¶

Gets the user input for the attack coordinates.

return (x,y): tuple containing the coordinates the user wants to attack.

game_engine.simple_game_loop()¶

Runs a simple game loop for a one player game of battleships on the console.
